headline: Is American Water Works Stock Still Fairly Priced After Recent Utilities Sector Headlines?
summary: Wondering if American Water Works Company is currently a smart buy? Let’s take a closer look at what’s driving its valuation and whether it truly lives up to its reputation among investors. The stock's price has moved up 0.9% over the past week, offsetting some of the 6.3% dip seen in the last month, and bringing its year-to-date change to a positive 7.2%. Recent headlines have highlighted the challenges and opportunities facing the broader utilities sector, such as heightened attention to...
